name: Memento Mori (itch)
description:
during an unexpected stay
in an in-between place.

Scripted by Nao & Nuha
with music by Hyo
code by Alynne
art by Thernz

Cover art by Katherine Elliot

Memento Mori was built in Twine 1.4.2
with additional macros by Leon Arnott
type rendering by Simo Kinnunen
font processor by Shaun Inman
dialogue font by Style-7
